title: Aleutian World War II National Historic Area: Aleutian Voices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Stories     Aleutian Voices                Aleutian Voices           Aleutian Voices, Volume 1, No. 1 Francis Broderick/Michael Burwell       Aleutian Voices is a series of publications that cover a wide range of topics from the war in the Aleutians to Unangan culture. The first edition was printed in 2014. As issues are developed they will be made available in print and for easy download here.  Aleutian Voices Volume 1, No. 1, 2014: SS Northwestern: Sailing Sheltered Seas. Download a copy (PDF 5.7 MB).    Aleutian Voices Volume 2, No. 1, 2015: Forced to Leave: The Evacuation of Unangax from the Aleutians during World War II. Read online or download a copy (PDF 2.6 MB).  Forthcoming Issues: The Calendar Issue: a compilation of short stories and photos (2016) Battle of Attu (2016) The Bombing of Dutch Harbor (2016)
